author: Sefy Levy
description: Classify REE fractionation and Eu anomalies using Boynton (1984) chondrite-normalized values
reference: Boynton, W. V. (1984). Cosmochemistry of the Rare Earth Elements: Meteorite Studies.

classifications.name: LREE-ENRICHED
classifications.description: Steep pattern; enrichment of Light REE relative to Middle REE (La_N/Sm_N > 2.0)

classifications.name: FLAT REE PATTERN
classifications.description: Minimal fractionation between LREE and MREE

classifications.name: HREE-ENRICHED
classifications.description: Depletion in MREE relative to Heavy REE; typical of garnet-rich sources

classifications.name: EU ANOMALY (NEGATIVE)
classifications.description: Eu/Eu* < 0.85; indicates plagioclase fractionation or removal

classifications.name: INSUFFICIENT NORMALIZED DATA
classifications.description: Missing key normalized values for La, Sm, Yb, or Eu
